definition: to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means
to extinguish or put out/to go out (of a fire etc)/to exterminate or wipe out/to drown

sentences.english: Pleistocene glaciation caused the extinction of many species.
sentences.chinese: 第四纪冰期，使许多物种绝灭。

sentences.english: Non synergy leads to fall after fall towards extinction thought-form.
sentences.chinese: 非协同，带来了一次又一次走向绝灭思想形态的跌落。

sentences.english: The butterfly is on the verge of extinction.
sentences.chinese: 枯叶蝶真是因此而要绝对的绝灭了。

sentences.english: Continental Cretaceous-Paleogene strata are important information carriers of this extinction event.
sentences.chinese: 陆相地层是恐龙绝灭等事件信息的重要载体。

sentences.english: Botanists believed that the species is extinct in the wild.
sentences.chinese: 植物学家相信本种已在野外绝灭。

sentences.english: The village would have been completely destroyed.
sentences.chinese: 那么，也许，整个村落会都绝灭了。

definition: to extinguish/to become extinct/to die out
to commit genocide/to become extinct/extinction of a race
to fall/meteor/to perish/see also 殞|殒[yun3]
